lines.text: Don't get her started all right. It's a long fucked up story and you probably won't believe it anyway. All I know is that this is the worst vacation of my life. I'm tired, I'm hungry, I'm fucking horny and I ain't seen one goddamn psycho killer.
This island didn't have a murder rate until you people showed up!
"Try" is like "maybe," Julie. "Try" is bullshit.
[the killer once again threatens Julie with a hook]
Hush, child. No more screaming, no more running, it's time to die!
[after shooting the fisherman]
Just...
[shoots him again]
Fucking...
[shoots him again]
DIE!
Every guy in history who tried to pick up a girl did the good-friend thing first.
[Ray appears pointing a gun at Ben Willis who's holding Julie hostage]
Let her go.
Oh God, you've got to be shitting me!
Let her go, Willis!
Or what? What are you gonna do, boy? Call us names?
Let her go NOW!
Think about it, boy. You're no killer. That's my job! You don't have it in you!

[Karla has just shown her a sun bed]
Great, cancer in a box.

[seeing the killer reach for a large spike]
Seriously, don't do that!
See anybody out there? How about Freddy or Jason or somebody?
[Karla stares at him, disgusted]
Hey, you gotta hang in there.
Any advice?
Yeah... Find another Jacuzzi

Bless me father, for I have sinned. It's been a year since my last confession. I've never told anyone about this. Not my mom, not the police, or not even my friends, except for the ones who were there, well, they're not around anymore. You see I, I killed a man, but it was an accident.

[holding a large kitchen knife]
What the hell are you doing in my closet?
Dude, I thought you were outta town. Look, I just wanted to borrow your black skirt, but I'm not ready to die for it.

[confronting her nemesis, hooded Ben Willis again after a year]
My God, you sick freak!
